Name: Siting
Village_Settlement: The population of Siting is approximately 600 people.
Surname_Groups: Surnames include the Zhang 张, Zheng 郑, and Chen 陈. There is no main surname group.
Village_Temples: Haopu shê 濠浦社, Xiangying xiantan 祥应显坛: The main gods are Zhongyou shenghou 忠祐圣侯 (Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王) and Houtu furen 后土夫人. Secondary gods include Zhanggong shengjun 张 公圣君.

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: On 1/14 the gods of the Haopushê 濠浦社 and the Xiangying xiantan 祥应显坛 go on procession within the village. Opera is performed and Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct rituals. The entire village organizes the ritual together, and funds are collected on a per capita basis.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 3/15: The birthday celebration of Zhongyou shenghou 忠祐圣侯 and Houtu furen 后土夫人. 7/23: The birthday celebration of Zhanggong shengjun 张公圣君. On these occasions, opera is performed and Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct rituals. The entire village organizes the ritual together, and funds are collected on a per capita basis.
